backend/main.mo: Main actor with access control, user types, and storage maps for hydration, sleep, running, reminders, rewards, and analytics.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy types and upgrading userRewards by adjusting streak values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a frontend update to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and styles used across the app.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file specifying the Internet Identity URL.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide covering common deployment issues and solutions for the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the app, registers the service worker, and sets PWA metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styled message, icon, and retry link.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, offline fallback, and network-first fetch strategy.
frontend/PWA.md: Documentation explaining PWA installation, offline support, updates, and troubleshooting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication, profile setup flow, UI layout, and feature tabs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAnaly: Renders admin summary cards showing user activity and feature usage metrics.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard that loads analytics, handles auth checks, and displays summaries or errors.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDebug: Debug panel showing principal, clipboard copy, and backend whoami test utilities.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserA: Displays searchable and sortable user analytics in a table and allows selecting a user entry.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserR: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginShareL: Allows users to share or copy the current login link using Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for entering and saving a user's profile name upon first-time setup.
frontend/src/components/history/EmptySta: Shows a decorative message when no intake history is available.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryV: Displays water intake history with stats, progress indicators, sorting, and offline handling.
frontend/src/components/intake/QuickAddI: Enables quick logging of water intake, updating rewards, streaks, and handling offline queuing.
frontend/src/components/intake/TodayProg: Shows today's water intake progress, streaks, and offline state with a visual progress card.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app’s header with branding, user greeting, and install/login buttons using user profile data.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: Shows an offline stale-data warning with optional timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Displays a PWA install button when installable and triggers the install prompt with success feedback.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineBanne: Shows a fixed banner warning the user when the app detects offline status.
frontend/src/components/reminders/AdminU: Empty placeholder file for an admin users table component.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Shows an in‑app reminder banner with icon, message, and dismiss action based on scheduler context.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Provides UI for toggling predefined reminders and managing custom reminders with CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Streak: Runs the streak‑break reminder hook and renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/rewards/BadgesGr: Displays all badge types with locked/unlocked states and icons based on user rewards.
frontend/src/components/rewards/GoalCele: Shows a celebratory card when a user hits their hydration goal, with animated icons and streak info.
frontend/src/components/rewards/RewardsP: Fetches and displays user reward stats, streaks, completed goals, and earned badges.
frontend/src/components/running/RunHisto: Lists running history with offline handling, loading state, and formatted run entries sorted by time.
frontend/src/components/running/RunLogFo: Form component for logging running distance, duration, and completion status with validation and offline support.
frontend/src/components/running/RunningV: Combines the run log form and run history list into a single view.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Displays and updates user hydration settings with validation, offline queuing, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepHisto: Fetches, sorts, and displays sleep history with averages, offline indicators, and conditional empty states.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepLogFo: Form for submitting hours slept with validation and offline mutation support.
Displays the sleep log form and sleep history list together.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login handling, stored identity loading, and context management.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks and returns the browser’s online/offline status via window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt events and exposes installability state and a method to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data with offline support and actor-based backend calls.
Provides a local reminder scheduler using intervals, notifications, and in‑app fallback reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderSchedulerC: Implements a context-based reminder scheduler supporting multiple reminder types and centralized notification handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreakBreakReminde: Checks user streak, intake, and settings to trigger end‑of‑day streak‑break warnings with daily anti‑spam logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables and animation utilities for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/offline/offlineQueue.ts: Implements a per-user FIFO offline action queue with persistence using offlineStorage.
frontend/src/offline/offlineStorage.ts: Provides JSON-based localStorage helpers with namespacing, versioning, and safe read/write/clear operations.
frontend/src/offline/OfflineSyncProvider: Monitors connectivity and syncs queued offline actions to the backend, then invalidates related React Query caches.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflinePreferenc: React hook that stores and retrieves the user’s offline-saving preference in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/analyticsFormat.ts: Formats bigint counts, timestamps, and cache ages into readable strings for analytics display.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Normalizes backend or agent error messages into concise, user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Implements robust copy-to-clipboard logic with Clipboard API and DOM fallback plus share support detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters for both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite env typings including optional VITE_II_URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and pending feature requests related to streaks, goals, and rewards.
